Package com.compsci408.androidrx.provider

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CalendarFragment
    Fragment which contains a CalendarView which a provider can use to select a date on which to add a prescription event.
    EditMedActivity  
    NewPrescriptionActivity
    Activity for adding new Prescriptions for for a given medication and patient.
    NewPrescriptionFragment
    Fragment which contains a form for setting Prescription events.
    PatientActivity
    Activity which displays a given patient's information, including his/her name and all scheduled medication alerts.
    PatientListActivity
    Activity which displays a list of the current provider's associated patients as well as a SearchView for filtering results in the event of a large number of patients for a single provider.
    PrescriptionsToAddFragment
    Fragment which contains a list of prescription events staged to be added to the database.
    ProviderMedicationActivity
    Activity which displays to a provider scheduled alert events for a given medication and patient.
